Boise_City.Ada Odd Fellows Temple: The Ada Odd Fellows Temple stood at 109-115​1⁄2 N. 9th Street in Boise, Idaho. Built in 1903 by the prominent local architecture firm of Tourtellotte and Co. (later Tourtellotte & Hummel), it served as the clubhouse of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows of Ada Lodge No. 3.
